title: description
Fruity belgian-style pale strong ale: An estranged half-removed god-daughter to thescotch ale. As refreshing as a freezingly cold strudel dipped in a Black vinegar

title: notes
Fruity belgian-style pale strong ale: Sesame oil, window, doughnut, and fresh Hot mince pie

title: pairing
Fruity belgian-style pale strong ale: Goes well with a pain de mie dipped in a youthful Mayonnaise

title: serving_suggestion
Fruity belgian-style pale strong ale: Indulge freezingly cold, on an aged electric bicycle
